institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operating rules/Article 29 (Changes to use of subsidies)
contents: Article 29 (Changes in use of support funds) ① The business group may change and use support items such as personnel expenses, general operating expenses, training facilities and equipment expenses, and program development expenses that received support pursuant to Article 14, Paragraph 1, Items 2 and 3 of the Operation Regulations. I can't. ② Notwithstanding paragraph 1, if there are unavoidable reasons for the efficient operation of an industry-led training project among items excluding training facilities and equipment costs, they may be changed and used with prior approval from the chairman of the board.
